abstract: I.B.M. sued one of its top executives on Thursday in an attempt to prevent him from taking a position at Apple, The New York Times John Markoff reported.
lead_paragraph: I.B.M. sued one of its top executives on Thursday in an attempt to prevent him from taking a position at Apple, The New York Times John Markoff reported.

headline.main: I.B.M. Sues to Block Executive’s Move to Apple
